1:
Praise Yahweh!\q1 You people who serve Yahweh, praise him!
\q1 Praise him!
\q1
2:
Everyone should praise Yahweh now and forever!

\q1
3:
People who live in the east and people who live in the west,\q2 everyone, should praise Yahweh!
\q1
4:
Yahweh rules over all the nations,\q1 and high in the heavens he shows that his glory is very great.


\q1
5:
There is no one who is like Yahweh, our God,\q2 who lives in the highest heaven
\q2
6:
and looks far down through the heavens and sees the people on the earth.


\q1
7:
He lifts poor people up so that they no longer sit in the dirt;\q1 he lifts needy people up so that they no longer sit on heaps of ashes
\q1
8:
and causes them to be honored by sitting next to leaders,\q2 leaders who rule his own people.


\q1
9:
He also enables women who have no children to live in their houses\q2 as happy as mothers with children.
\q1 Praise Yahweh!
